title: Todd, the Ugliest Kid on Earth Vol. 1
description: This critically acclaimed hit series (now ongoing!) brings its first story arc to the trade paperback format. Follow the misadventures of the Belluomo family and their infectiously optimistic, paper-bag-wearing son. Irreverent and politically incorrect, Todd tickles every taboo in one wild ride filled with ax murderers, cults, celebrity stalkers, and a neo-Nazi prison gang. Collects Todd, The Ugliest Kid on Earth #1-4.
author: Ken Kristensen
